_comment: STARTER SETTINGS — Recommended for new Claude Code users.
_comment2: In this config, Claude will ask before running ANY shell command.
_comment3: As you get comfortable, move specific trusted commands to the 'allow' list.
_model_comment: DEFAULT: claude-sonnet-4-6 — use this for all routine tasks.
_model_comment2: claude-opus-4-6 is significantly more expensive. Reserve it for genuinely complex tasks
_model_comment3: (large architecture decisions, intricate multi-system debugging). Not for everyday use.
_model_comment4: Formal governance around model usage and token budgets is coming. Use responsibly.
_plugins_comment: Add plugins here after installing them via /plugins in a Claude session.
